page.name: Honda's Legacy
page.description: An ancient technique developed by the legendary Honda. Summon four kunai to fly at your foe and poison them! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Honda's Legacy
properties.description: An ancient technique developed by the legendary Honda. Summon four kunai to fly at your foe and poison them! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Venomous Katana
page.description: This blade may appear delicate but it has been forged by a master sword smith. It will hold its edge even after 10,000 strikes. A thin layer of deadly Scorpiarc venom makes sure it finishes any foe.

page.name: Energetic Ninja Headband
page.description: One day you're going to show everyone who doubted you that you are the strongest ninja ever. BELIEVE IT!

page.name: Shadowy Mask
page.description: As a ninja you need to strike a balance between being able to see clearly and hiding who you are from your target. This mask does both perfectly!
